title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; runs in Node, Deno, or browsers via a proxy.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama chat & embedding support to LangChain.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama—chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, prompt templates, and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-gpt4all
summary: Docs showing how to import GPT4All models into Ollama for extra quantized models.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) with one-line run commands and docker-compose samples.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async bindings to the Ollama REST API; crates.io published.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with Blazor demo; NuGet package OllamaSharp.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Socket Mode to answer questions with Ollama models.

title: reddit/r/ollama – weekly discussion thread
summary: Active subreddit sharing new models, Modelfiles, and troubleshooting tips for Ollama.

title: ollama-hnsw
summary: Fast approximate nearest-neighbor wrapper using hnswlib on top of Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: One-file Streamlit chat app that autodetects and lists local Ollama models.
